answers.answer: Hi...we do have a list we posted in the Health Pages -http://www.medhelp.org/health_pages/Neurological%20Disorders/Tips-for-the-Hospital-Stay/show/1136?cid=186Uwill find it on page 2 if u do not use the above link.The first 2 weeks u may need help with bathing , and getting meals....ur baths can wait if u have a DH that works or get a visiting nurse to help u.Ur mom may be a help if she is able to bring u something to eat.....and remind u to take ur meds.
